text.title: U2 tour manager, Dennis Sheehan dies in Los Angeles hotel room at 68
text.head: U2 tour manager, Dennis Sheehan dies in Los Angeles hotel room at 68
Sources

list.item: Billboard Staff. "U2 Honours Tour Manager Dennis Sheehan at Forum Show in Los Angeles" — Billboard , 28 May 2015
Tshepo Mokoena. "U2 honour tour manager found dead in hotel room" — The Guardian , 28 May 2015
Kory Grow. "U2 Tour Manager Dennis Sheehan Dead at 68" — Rolling Stone , 27 May 2015
"U2 tour manager, Dennis Sheehan, found dead in Los Angeles hotel room" — ABC News (Australia) , 28 May 2015
Joe Lynch. "U2's Longtime Tour Manager Dennis Sheehan Dies" — Billboard , Joe Lynch
"U2 tour manager Dennis Sheehan Dies in LA hotel" — The Sydney Morning Herald , 28 May 2015
